name: Twin Mind: Nobody's Here Collector's Edition
name_original: Twin Mind: Nobody's Here Collector's Edition
description:
In this Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure:

An alarming phone call from Randall’s friend Rebecca - a science center employee - is the reason two outstanding detectives you play as get caught up in a sci-fi thriller story full of personal drama. A scientist’s death is considered being an accident, but this theory is being contradicted by the following facts: the closed from the inside door and multiple signs of a struggle on the victim’s body. But the security footage shows no one but the victim himself! Something isn’t adding up here, and you are to figure everything out! Solve tricky riddles and find out the truth. Gather your wits for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

Savor the enticing story full of unexpected plot twists!
Play as two characters to get the full picture of what's going on.
Make your own choices - embrace their consequences.
Enjoy multiple atmospheric locations!
Search and find items and solve puzzles!
